view

Class PieceAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • view.PieceAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class PieceAnimation
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    Class that deals with the Animation of the Pieces. Handles battle, bomb, tie, and winner animations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PieceAnimation

        public PieceAnimation()
        Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • battle

        public void battle(Piece winner,
                   Piece loser)
        Takes in two pieces, get their images and creates an animation of the winner battling the loser. The winner grows and hits the loser. Loser shakes and falls down. Animation ends. If the winner is a bomb, then play the bomb animation instead.
        Parameters:
        winner - Piece that won the battle.
        loser - Piece that lost the battle.

      • tie

        public void tie(Piece winner,
                Piece loser)
        Plays when two pieces tie. Both pieces enlarge and attack each other. Although they are labeled winner and loser, there is no winner and loser. It is used to determine difference of pieces. Animation ends.
        Parameters:
        winner - Piece that won the battle.
        loser - Piece that lost the battle.

      • winner

        public void winner(boolean team)
        Plays when the game is over. The color of the winner is faded on and a message enlarges onto screen.
        Parameters:
        team - Team that won the game.

      • playAnimation

        public void playAnimation()
        Plays the animation. Plays the fade and the timeline.

      • bombExplode

        private void bombExplode()
        Plays the bomb explosion animation. Loser image comes onto screen and then bomb gif plays on top. Animation ends.

      • reset

        private void reset()
        Sets all the globals to null and removes all the children from the Pane. Ready for a new animation.

      • begin

        private void begin(Piece winner,
                   Piece loser)
        Creates the black fade, creates the timeline, and gets the image strings.
        Parameters:
        winner - Piece that won the battle.
        loser - Piece that lost the battle.

      • setImages

        private void setImages()
        Sets the images with their image strings.
